name: FileServe - Non Premium Member Cleaner 2012-Apr-16
description: Hides all the ads on fileserve.com begging you to upgrade your standard user account to Premium.
additional_info:
/* +++ changelog +++
April 16th, 2012
- fixed it
July 14th, 2011
- Hides "Hot Weekend Promotion" Ad
June 8th, 2011
- Cleans up 404 error landing page
March 29th, 2011
- Hides "Become a Premium user" On Deleted List
- Hides "Choose your FileServe Premium plan to get" On Deleted List
- Hides "Choose your plan" On Deleted List
- Hides "Download with Fileserve Manager"
- Hides "Login as a Premium user" On Error 404 Page
- Centers Error Messages On Deleted List
March 18th, 2011
- Hides "Choose your FileServe Premium plan" On Download Page (Only Appears On "File not available" Page)
March 3rd, 2011
- Hides "Make Money With VideoBB" Ad
Jan 26nd, 2011
- Hides "Become premium member to download all files" Link On List Page
Jan 22nd, 2011
- Hides "FileServe Premium" Ad On Download Page
- Hides "Advertisement" On Download Page
- Hides "iframe" Ads On Download Page
Dec 30th, 2010
- Hides "PopUp Upgrade to Premium" Ad
- Hides "Make Money" Tab In Header
- Hides "Upgrade Panel" On Dashboard
Dec 19th, 2010
- Hides Login Box Since This Is For Non Premium Members
- Hides "Upgrade to Premium" Button
- Centers "Download Count Down"
- Centers "File Information"
- Centers "Bookmark and Share"
Dec 3rd, 2010
- Now Cleans The Download Page Too
Nov 28th, 2010
- Original Release
*/

discussions.name: Whitespace character causing error, and title ambiguity?
